title: Around 3,37,900 MW power capacity to be added by 2032: MoS Shripad Naik
description: India is set to add 3,37,900 MW of power capacity by 2032, enhancing its current capacity which saw a notable increase over the past decade. The additions will come from a mix of thermal, hydropower, nuclear, and renewable energy sources, with detailed figures provided by Union Minister of State for Power Shripad Naik.
